title: Human-human, human-machine communication: on the HuComTech multimodal corpus

So the language of the corpus is Hungarian.
We had dialogues, formal and informal dialogues with 110 University students.
And there was a single agent.
The duration was 5550 hours and about 500,000 running words in the corpus.
And the number of annotations that we have now calculated is more than 1,000,000, but probably it will rise even even more.
